direction.description: Specify the step bar orientation. Currently, two orientations are supported: horizontal ('horizontal') and vertical ('vertical').
direction.description_zh: 指定步骤条方向。目前支持水平（`horizontal`）和竖直（`vertical`）两种方向

icon.description: The type of icon in the step, optional

status.description: Specify the status of the current step, optionally 'wait', 'process', 'finish' error
status.description_zh: 指定状态。当不配置该属性时，会使用 Steps 的 current 来自动指定状态。可选：wait process finish error
